Description: SystemVerilog package for SQLite DPI interface

Variables
SQLITE_MAX_PATH
`define SQLITE_MAX_PATH 256

Maximum length of database file path

SQLITE_MAX_QUERY
`define SQLITE_MAX_QUERY 1024

Maximum length of SQL query string

Data exchange structures and utilities
Types
sqlite_data_type_e

SQLite data types enumeration

typedef enum {SQLITE_NULL, SQLITE_INTEGER, SQLITE_FLOAT, SQLITE_TEXT, SQLITE_BLOB} sqlite_data_type_e;
Values

  • SQLITE_NULL  - NULL value

  • SQLITE_INTEGER  - 64-bit signed integer

  • SQLITE_FLOAT  - 64-bit IEEE floating point number

  • SQLITE_TEXT  - UTF-8 or UTF-16 string

  • SQLITE_BLOB  - Binary large object

SQLite database operations
Functions
sqlite_dpi_open_database
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_OPEN_DATABASE import "DPI-C" function chandle sqlite_dpi_open_database(
input 
string 
db_path
)

Opens a SQLite database connection

Parameter: db_path Path to the SQLite database file

Returns: Database handle on success, null on failure

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_OPEN_DATABASE

sqlite_dpi_close_database
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_CLOSE_DATABASE import "DPI-C" function void sqlite_dpi_close_database(
input 
chandle 
db
)

Closes a SQLite database connection

Parameter: db Database handle to close

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_CLOSE_DATABASE

sqlite_dpi_execute_query
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_EXECUTE_QUERY import "DPI-C" function int sqlite_dpi_execute_query(
input 
chandle 
db,
input 
string 
query
)

Executes an SQL query

Parameter: db Database handle

Parameter: query SQL query string

Returns: 0 on success, -1 on failure

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_EXECUTE_QUERY

sqlite_dpi_read_schema

input 
chandle 
db
)

Reads the database schema

Parameters
db
input chandle

Database handle.

Returns

0 on success, -1 on failure.

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_READ_SCHEMA

Parameters
db
input chandle

Database handle.

sqlite_dpi_table_exists
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_TABLE_EXISTS import "DPI-C" function int sqlite_dpi_table_exists(
input 
chandle 
db,
input 
string 
table_name
)

Checks if a table exists in the database

Parameters
db
input chandle

Database handle.

table_name
input string

Name of the table to check.

Returns

1 if table exists, 0 if not, -1 on error.

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_TABLE_EXISTS

sqlite_dpi_get_row
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_GET_ROW import "DPI-C" function int sqlite_dpi_get_row(
input 
chandle 
db,
input 
string 
table_name,
input 
int 
row_id
)

Retrieves a single row from a table

Parameters
db
input chandle

Database handle.

table_name
input string

Name of the table to retrieve.

row_id
input int

ID of the row to retrieve.

Returns

0 on success, -1 on failure.

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_GET_ROW

sqlite_dpi_get_rowid_by_column_value
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_GET_ROWID_BY_COLUMN_VALUE import "DPI-C" function int sqlite_dpi_get_rowid_by_column_value(
input 
chandle 
db,
input 
string 
table_name,
input 
string 
column,
input 
string 
value
)

Retrieves the first row ID that matches a specific column value

Parameters
db
input chandle

Database handle.

table_name
input string

Name of the table.

column
input string

Name of the column to search in.

value
input string

Value to search for.

Returns

Row ID if found, -1 if not found or on error.

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_GET_ROWID_BY_COLUMN_VALUE

sqlite_dpi_get_cell_value
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_GET_CELL_VALUE import "DPI-C" function string sqlite_dpi_get_cell_value(
input 
chandle 
db,
input 
string 
table_name,
input 
int 
row_id,
input 
string 
column
)

Retrieves the value of a specific cell (column in a row)

Parameters
db
input chandle

Database handle.

table_name
input string

Name of the table.

row_id
input int

ID of the row.

column
input string

Name of the column.

Returns

The cell value as a string, or an empty string on error.

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_GET_CELL_VALUE

input

input

input

)

Parameter: index_name Name of the index to create

Parameter: table Name of the table

Parameter: column Name of the column to index

Returns: 0 on success, -1 on failure

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_CREATE_INDEX

sqlite_dpi_insert_row
`ifndef NO_SQLITE_DPI_INSERT_ROW import "DPI-C" function int sqlite_dpi_insert_row(
input 
chandle 
db,
input 
string 
table_name,
input 
string 
columns,
input 
string 
values
)

Inserts a row into a table

Parameters
db
input chandle

Database handle.

table

Table name.

columns
input string

JSON string containing column names.

values
input string

JSON string containing values to insert.

Returns

ID of the inserted row, -1 on failure.

Note: Can be disabled with `define NO_SQLITE_DPI_INSERT_ROW
